name: Rapid Software Solution Ltd.
description: Developer of a software development platform intended to connect developers with public APIs. The company's platform tracks and manages all API connections using software tools and provides access to real-time data notifications, enabling developers to integrate seamlessly with internal systems.
one_liner: Developer of a software development platform intended to connect developers with public APIs.
